biotools.summary:
PedMiner is a tool for linkage analysis-based identification of disease-associated variants using family based whole-exome sequencing data.

The advance in Next Generation Sequencing technology has revolutionized the field of disease research.

( PedMiner offers a default filtration process to prioritize the candidate variants ).

Inheritance Pattern: Autosomal recessive.
